ygData.subject: Re: Horrifying!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You answer this question in your own words just a couple sentences away... ... Damn right I am upset.  I play a limited amount of time and I have to
ygData.messageBody:
>
> What exactly is so bad about it?


You answer this question in your own words just a couple sentences away...


> You're just upset
> that she gets an advantage you didn't, right? Well, life is tough like
> that.

Damn right I am upset. I play a limited amount of time and I have to compete with everyone else
in the game. At similar levels we should have the same ability to compete. But with her
twinking I am at the disadvantage. While she coasts yet another character to the upper levels
AT MY EXPENSE!! Yes I am upset and yes she should be told to play fair like the rest of us are
forced too.


> Well, life is tough like
> that. Whether she gets an advantage or not, is none of your business
> because it doesn't really affect you.


It does affect me. It makes that many fewer creatures at my level available for me to kill in
an HONORABLE way. This makes my job (an already difficult one) even more difficult and that is
why twinking is the WORST POSSIBLE OFFENSE.


> And remember, she had to work her
> way to level 22 before that as well, so she is only giving her other
> Char something she rightfully earned.

And just WHAT is your point? Because she has one character at a high level and can play in
areas that I cannot she has somehow earned the right to retard my low level characters
development (see above) making it even more difficult for me to get to my "rightfully earned"
22nd level.

You are obviously a fool and most likely a twinker. I can only hope you are not on my server.


>
> The only bother, is pure green jealousy, isn't it? You're just upset
> that she gets an advantage you didn't, right? Well, life is tough like
> that. Whether she gets an advantage or not, is none of your business
> because it doesn't really affect you. And remember, she had to work her
> way to level 22 before that as well, so she is only giving her other
> Char something she rightfully earned.
>
> Just concentrate on your own character and stop being a jerk about it.
>
> --
> Qenelin
>
